name: A standard hp1.0-1.5 1 unit
detail:
- Cleaning and checking of indoor filter
- Cleaning of evaporator coil
- Checking of A/C fan bearing
- Test-run of the system to ensure it is in proper working condition
- Cleaning of blower wheels and blades
- Checking of thermostats and control R22 gas top up at no additional char

name: Chemical servicing hp1.0-1.5
detail:
- Cleaning and checking of indoor filter
- Cleaning of evaporator coil
- Flushing of drainage system
- Checking of A/C fan bearing
- Test-run of the system to ensure it is in proper working condition
- Chemical Cleaning of external and internal unit
- Cleaning of blower wheels and blades
- Checking of thermostats and control R22 gas top up at no additional charge

name: Standard Cleaning (Supplies Not Provided)
detail:
- Cleaning of all bedrooms requested
- Cleaning of all bathroom and toilets requested
- Cleaning of living room and balcony (if applicable)
- Cleaning including sweeping, mopping, dusting, general tidying and vacuuming
- Not valid for moving in/out cleaning or Post Renovation cleaning

name: Standard Cleaning (Supplies Provided)
detail:
- Cleaning of all bedrooms requested
- Cleaning of all bathroom and toilets requested
- Cleaning of living room and balcony (if applicable)
- Cleaning including sweeping, mopping, dusting, general tidying and vacuuming

- Standard Cleaning Supplies
